mapper.select: SELECT lno,lname, lorg, lfee, lclass, lreq, ldetail, lcut, linfo,lfreeq,la FROM license WHERE lno=#{lno}
mapper.insert: insert into license ( lname, lorg, lfee, lclass, lreq, ldetail, lcut, linfo,lfreeq,la) values (#{lname},#{lorg},#{lfee},#{lclass},#{lreq},#{ldetail},#{lcut},#{linfo},#{lfreeq},#{la})
mapper.update: UPDATE license SET lname=#{lname}, lorg=#{lorg}, lfee=#{lfee}, lclass=#{lclass}, lreq=#{lreq}, ldetail=#{ldetail}, lcut=#{lcut}, linfo=#{linfo},lfreeq=#{lfreeq},la=#{la} WHERE lno=#{lno}
